contexts.context: ...at the shrines to receive their benefits. And Almsivi is <mark>generous</mark>, so even the Unbeliever may receive a blessing if he...

...Like stern parents, they punish sin and error. Like <mark>generous</mark> relatives, they share their bounty among the greatest and least...
